justification: The portfolio is constructed based on strong bullish momentum signals from MACD and RSI indicators. XLF.P and XRT.P show potential for reversal with RSI below 30 indicating oversold conditions, while XLK.P and PPH.O exhibit strong uptrends with RSI above 70 and positive MACD alignment, supporting short-term gains.

I selected ETFs with strong bullish momentum based on MACD histogram expansion and RSI above 50 but not overbought, focusing on QQQ.O for its high RSI and positive MACD signals, XLB.P for its large MACD histogram and solid RSI, and IJK.P for its strong MACD line and histogram. Weights are allocated to maximize exposure to these high-potential assets.

I selected ETFs with strong bullish momentum based on high RSI (above 70) and positive MACD histogram values, indicating upward trends and potential for continued gains. SPYG.P and VONG.O show the highest RSI and positive MACD signals, while VUG.P and XLK.P also exhibit strong momentum, with IJK.P included for its solid MACD performance despite a moderate RSI.

The portfolio is concentrated in QQQ.O and XLY.P due to their strong bullish momentum signals, including high RSI near overbought levels indicating sustained upward pressure, positive MACD lines above signals, and price above EMAs. XLK.P is included for its solid trend and momentum, while SPY.P is added for diversification with moderate positive indicators.

The portfolio is constructed based on strong bullish momentum signals from MACD histogram and RSI. IJK.P and IJS.P show high MACD histogram values (1.496 and 1.792) indicating strong upward momentum, with RSI in neutral to slightly overbought ranges supporting continued gains. MDY.P has a high MACD histogram (1.260) and neutral RSI, suggesting solid trend strength. QQQ.O, despite an overbought RSI (74.973), maintains a positive MACD histogram (0.796) for short-term potential, while SPY.P offers diversification with moderate signals.

The portfolio is constructed based on strong bullish momentum signals: QQQ.O and SPYG.P exhibit high RSI and positive MACD histograms indicating strong uptrends, while XLU.P shows a robust MACD histogram and high RSI for defensive growth. VUG.P is included for its positive momentum, and SPY.P provides broad market exposure with solid indicators. Weights are allocated to maximize exposure to the highest conviction signals.

The portfolio is constructed based on strong bullish momentum signals: IBB.O shows a positive and rising MACD line with a strong histogram, indicating strong upward trend; XLF.P has a high RSI near overbought but positive MACD histogram, suggesting continued momentum; XLV.P exhibits a positive MACD line and histogram with a high RSI, supporting further gains; PPH.O has a positive MACD line and histogram with a favorable RSI, indicating solid trend strength; and IJS.P displays a positive MACD histogram and neutral RSI, adding diversification with upside potential.
